text: hard-cooked eggs aren't just for
breakfast in fact they make an awesome
nutrient-rich snack high in protein
vitamins healthy fat they will keep you
from reaching for the bad stuff so to
begin take a hard cooked egg tap it on
the top to peel so hard cooked eggs are
the ultimate convenience food you can
have them in your office you can keep
them at home the great thing about them
is that you can just reach for them and
you can always have a healthy snack
so slice the egg in half beautiful yolk
and then I like to season it with a
little bit of flaky sea salt because
adds a really nice texture hit a pepper
and then this is sort of my play on a
deviled egg we're gonna skip the
mayonnaise here and just add a dollop of
whole-grain mustard and this tiny dollop
delivers quite a punch flavor-wise the
nice thing about this is you probably
have all of these ingredients in your
pantry already then I just take
whichever herbs I happen to have on hand
parsley and dill here and you're set
this took no time quick simple easy and
healthy
you
